Title: Requires the district attorney to file information with the accusatory instrument when certain crimes are committed against a woman and it is not charged as a hate crime
Summary: Requires the district attorney to file information with the accusatory instrument when certain crimes are committed against a woman and it is not charged as a hate crime.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to filing information with the accusatory instrument where the district attorney does not charge a person with a hate crime when certain offenses are committed against female victims
